recipes.name: Chapli Kebab
instructions: In a bowl mix together mince, gram flour, crushed coriander, pomegranate seeds, crushed red pepper, garam masala powder and salt.
Finely chop tomatoes, onion, green chilies and coriander leaves.
Add vegetables in the mince mixture.
Then add egg and butter. Mix very well.
Form large patties with the mince mixture.
Then fry in a large griddle until golden brown.
